com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.groups.distributed

Class DistributedGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.groups.distributed.DistributedGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IChannelListener, IGroup

    public final class DistributedGroup
extends Object
implements IGroup, IChannelListener
    Elementary distributed group implementation.

    In this implementation:

    • Current local group members (via join(com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.groups.GroupMember, com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.groups.GroupMemberRole)) are periodically multicast on a group control channel
    • Similar group multicasts are received and used to maintain a consolidated view of the distributed group
    • Group members are aged at the local group publishing periodicity unless specified otherwise) and expelled when they reach the age threshold.
    • When any change in the group occurs the client receives a complete group snapshot via their IGroupChangeListener registration.
